changelogs.title: Website stats integration hardening
changelogs.description: Improve reliability and diagnostics of bot-to-website stats sync; corrected endpoint configuration.
features: Default production stats endpoint baked into code
improvements: Error logging now includes HTTP status, statusText, and raw response; safely handles non‑JSON bodies
fixes: Fixed misconfigured WEBSITE_API_URL (/api/health -> /api/update-stats); aligned BOT_API_TOKEN between bot and Netlify; stats updates now succeed

changelogs.title: Persistent Configuration & Bug Fixes
changelogs.description: Improved configuration persistence and cross-platform support
improvements: Better error handling for file operations
fixes: Fixed path resolution in config commands

changelogs.title: Website Data & Design Update
changelogs.description: Introduced data verification and visual improvements, with a known API issue
improvements:
• Improved overall website styling and layout
• Enhanced UI elements for better readability
fixes:
• Known Issue: Website API check functionality is currently broken and returns no data
• Temporary Workaround: Manually refresh the page or use direct API endpoint until fix is deployed

changelogs.title: Cute & Fluffy Makeover
changelogs.description: Complete website redesign with adorable fluffy theme, real-time bot statistics, and enhanced user experience

changelogs.title: Server Advertisement Command Added
changelogs.description: New owner command for promoting the Fluffy community server

changelogs.title: Major Bot Improvements & New Features
changelogs.description: Comprehensive update with new systems, better configuration, and enhanced functionality
features: Enhanced help command with role-based guidance
